attributes.action: Restrict hgv and other large vehicles to the first lane on duel carageways and two lane motorways during rush hour periods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a system used in Europe which allows a better flow of cars during a two hour period at the start and end of the working day, it could also be used at other times to allow small vehicle traffic which are delayed by large vehicle which only are capable of one or two mph than the vehicles they are trying to overtake.
